Trade/Device Name(s): Human IgA Liquid Reagent Kit for use on the SPAPLUS
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Human IgA Liquid Reagent Kit for quantitative in vitro measurement of human IgA using turbidimetric analysis on SPAPLUS platform
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative in vitro determination of human IgA in serum, lithium heparin or EDTA plasma using the SPAPLUS analyser; aids diagnosis of abnormal protein metabolism and immune deficiency when used with other findings
